issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
When building a map on iOS6 with Titanium it behaves differently from the actual Maps application and different from Titanium with iOS5 maps. In both you can zoom out so you can see a much larger part of the world/continent. I need to zoom out this far because I develop an app that tracks satellites.

I'm not sure if this is a real bug, but I would expect the same map experience with Titanium compared with the normal Maps app.

In the attachments you can see the max zoom level in the Maps app compared to max zoom in Titanium Maps.
fields.summary: iOS6 Maps: unable to go to max zoom in Titanium
fields.environment:
SDK 2.1.4GA
iOS6.0.1
Test in iPhone Simulator and actual device

comments.body: We're directly using the provided API from Apple
